projects.title: BuiltByGervonte
projects.description: Rebranded home for BuiltByGervonte LLC with refreshed SEO, structured data, brand assets, and performance-minded Next.js theming.
projects.longDescription: The former Portfolio AI site is now the official BuiltByGervonte studio home page. It blends AI-assisted build workflows with a refreshed brand system, expanded structured data (Organization + Person schemas), updated sitemap/robots, and regenerated favicon/touch icons. The experience keeps the sakura/ocean theming, deep technical write-ups, and CI/CD rigor while centering the studio's product work and services.
achievements: Rebranded SEO metadata, sitemaps, and manifest for BuiltByGervonte
Organization + Person structured data with linked @id graph
Regenerated favicon, SVG, and Apple touch icons with proper color profiles
Dynamic sakura/ocean themes with Mantine UI and Framer Motion
CI/CD with scheduled deploys, PR automation, and branch protection
Interactive technical deep-dives and resume-driven data display

analytics.description: Tracks user behavior, page views, and engagement patterns to understand user preferences.

monitoring.description: Monitors system health, uptime, and error rates to ensure reliable performance.

screenshots.caption: Scheduled Daily Deploy workflow showing successful runs at 10:13 AM with ~2 minute duration
screenshots.alt: GitHub Actions scheduled deployment workflow runs

screenshots.caption: CI/CD pipeline status showing automated checks, deployment status, and merge readiness
screenshots.alt: GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline status and checks

cicd.description: Automated pipeline that tests, builds, and deploys code with daily scheduled releases.
workflows: Scheduled Daily Deploy (2:00 PM UTC / 10:00 AM EST)
automation: Auto-create PRs from preview to main

architecture.description: Built with Next.js, TypeScript, Mantine UI, and GitHub Actions for CI/CD.
architecture.deployment: Vercel with CDN + Scheduled GitHub Actions
architecture.workflow: Feature Branch → Preview → Scheduled Main Deploy → Auto-sync Preview

projects.title: Audio Key BPM Analyzer AI
projects.description: KIRO/AI generated music tool that helps new (or not so new!) music producers by analyzing the key and BPM of an instrumental file. Useful for autotune applications.
projects.longDescription: This tool is comparable in output to Tunebat.com's key and bpm analyzer. The waveform display was inspired by Soundcloud and the algorithm behind the analysis uses essentia.js. It's main use case is for analyzing instrumental music files as a music producer with a lack of music theory knowledge.
achievements: AI-assisted development taking concept to deployment
Responsive design with Chakra UI components
Audio key and BPM analysis with essentia.js

analytics.description: Tracks user engagement and audio processing metrics including files processed.

monitoring.description: Monitors audio processing errors and system health for reliable analysis.

cicd.description: Automated pipeline that tests, builds, and deploys with continuous integration.

architecture.description: Built with Vite, Chakra UI, Essentia.js for audio analysis, and Web Audio API.
